Author: michaelneale
Content: An oldie but a goodie. Has a bit of open source myth in it though. He kind of believes that it magically congeals out of the ether, rather then by frequent (and paid for) hard work of hackers and engineers in a deliberate fashion.

Author: iotal
Title: GWT 1.4 release and out of beta

Author: iotal
Title: Apple now sells more than one in six laptops in U.S.

Author: jgamman
Content: success is being able to do what you want: if he's an image-geek, working with the premier image software company might be a real plus for him/her.  i don't see many people hassling norvig for be 'hired' by google...

Author: jgamman
Content: a case can be made that advertising at the correct moment in time for a particular individual is information.  you want a new mattress, open the pipe, mattresses galore, buy, close pipe.  \nthe key is to figure out the when and the personalisation, search is the first to get close to it (and it's still not perfect - the next thing i'd like to see is trimming but i assume that'll take that semantic web thing i keep hearing about)
